cohortName: Chronic obstructive lung disease referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (255573) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Chronic obstructive lung disease referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (255573) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Hospitalization for Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, defined by inpatient visit with a primary condition occurrence of COPD conceptset
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) prevalent cohort, defined by condition occurrence of COPD or drug exposure for COPD mono- or combo-therapy at age>55 and no condition of asthma
